title: Paper Accepted for SCAM 2022
abstract: The paper entitled "CodeCV: Mining Expertise of GitHub Users from Coding Activities" written by Daniel Atzberger, Nico Scordialo, Tim Cech, Willy Scheibel, Matthias Trapp, and Jürgen Döllner is accepted for publication on the International Working Conference on Source Code Analysis and Manipulation (SCAM 2022).
